column6: This is a high rating product .It is within the hundred dollars

column14: In order to keep my family and I safe while driving, I had to buy a dash cam. I found this cheap but contains three cameras dash cam. In the beginning, I didn’t have much faith in HP and did not expect too much, however, after a long period time of using it, my impression changed.

column6: It has 3 channel that records simultaneously
column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
column14: I got to give credit how good this Dash Cam.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021
column14: The X86 three channel dash camera provide you peace of mind about your surrounding, great for Uber/Lyft drivers. It supports up to 128 gb memory card. The picture is clear with less distortion compare to other dash camera. one thing I like most about this dash camera is that you can adjust the rear facing lens approximately 30 degrees upward or downward to fully capture the interior of your car. however, the power plug that comes with the dash cam doesn't have a USB port for you to charge other devices. Other than that, it's a good dash cam to have.

column6: Wide open lenses to both front and rear
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
column14: I have used a batch of front-view dash cams and some worked pretty well. But I decided to switch to the dual-camera after being rear-ended.

column6: Open right away and check package
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
column14: I received this back in September but my husband Just now got around to installing it for me. We just opened the package and I would recommend against that. Open it when you receive it and make sure all the items are there. It was supposed to come with a SIM card and there was not one in the package. We tore The Who package apart looking for it! It’s been 6 months so there is nothing I can do now and it’s pretty much useless. Another things is the picture does not accurately describe the actual product. One other thing is there is a port for GPS AND the charging port that BOTH plug into the same port. So if your charging you can’t have the GPS plugged in. It also says in the instructions to contact them for GPS player instalaron package. You don’t get what you think you are ordering. That’s all I’m saying.

column6: I like it so far. Works for me.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2022
column14: Bought this camera since it is not very safe nowadays on the road ever since the pandemic started. The videos actually helped a lot explaining how to use it as I dont enjoy reading the user manual. Mine actually has the SD card inserted in the cam already so thats kinda nice. I like that it has the 4K and 1080p options. If I am taking a video of myself then I will rotate the 4K to inside the car rather than outside. Really enjoy the super night vision as well. No complaints so far.

column6: Easy to set up, good quality
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2022
column14: I think this product is very easy to install, very nice set up manual! This is so important! I’m having trouble with my echo dot cauz the set up is too confusing. Only one suggestion with this camera is that if possible, I wish it can be smaller because I have a small car. Just for the aesthetics. But it is small already compare to other products out there.
